home.title: ELEMATT | Baby Products Designed with Love
home.description: ELEMATT creates baby products that combine safety, design, and emotion. Each product tells a unique story inspired by Elena and her friends' childhood.
home.keywords: ELEMATT, baby products, baby mat, children's products, baby design, baby safety, Elena, the fantastic 4
home.heroDescription: Baby products designed with love, safety, and a unique story
home.aboutText1: ELEMATT was born from a mother's love for her daughter Elena and her three best friends from daycare: Laia, Isabela, and Olivia.
home.aboutText2: Every product we create is inspired by their adventures, always accompanied by Pep, the stuffed elephant who became our brand's symbol.
home.productDescription: A mat that not only protects your baby but transforms your home into a magical space for play, learning, and calm.
home.feature1Desc: Superior protection that other mats can't offer
home.feature2Desc: Safe from birth, tested by independent laboratory
home.compactDesc: Ideal for bedrooms or small spaces without sacrificing comfort and safety.
home.xlDesc: Perfect for creating a spacious family play area where everyone can enjoy.
home.fantastic4Desc: Elena, Laia, Isabela, and Olivia formed a special bond at daycare. Their adventures together inspired the illustrations on our products.
home.coastalVillageDesc: Calm, tenderness, and summer. Inspired by the fantastic 4's adventures by the sea.
home.tropicalJungleDesc: Adventure, curiosity, and nature. Where Pep and Elena explore together.
home.dedication: "For my friends Laia, Isabela, and Olivia"
home.dedicationAuthor: — Elena's dedication at the end of daycare
home.ctaDescription: Learn how ELEMATT was born and the inspiration behind each product

history.title: Our Story - ELEMATT
history.description: Discover the real story behind ELEMATT: Elena, Pep, and the fantastic 4. A story of friendship, play, and love that was born at daycare.
history.heroTitle: A Real Story Born from Play
history.heroDescription: Where every story begins on a mat
history.pepQuote: "Pep accompanies Elena on every adventure, reminding us that playing is also learning."
history.pepText1: His presence in every ELEMATT product symbolizes the tenderness, curiosity, and emotional connection we want to convey to every family.
history.pepText2: Each product tells a fragment of that story: a mat to play on, cards to discover, and a world full of love and friendship.
history.fantastic4Intro: Elena, Laia, Isabela, and Olivia formed a special bond at daycare. Their adventures together inspired the illustrations on our products.
history.dedication: "For my friends Laia, Isabela, and Olivia"
history.dedicationAuthor: — Elena's dedication at the end of daycare
history.coastalVillageDesc: One side of our mat is inspired by the fantastic 4's adventures in a coastal village: calm, tenderness, and summer.
history.tropicalJungleDesc: The other side represents the tropical jungle: adventure, curiosity, and nature, where Pep and Elena explore together.
history.ctaDescription: Every ELEMATT product is designed with love, inspired by real stories, and created to accompany your baby's growth.
